points.g: Perform a global match (find all matches rather than stopping after the first match)

points.[abc]: Find any character between the brackets
points.[^abc]: Find any character NOT between the brackets
points.[0-9]: Find any character between the brackets (any digit)
points.[^0-9]: Find any character NOT between the brackets (any non-digit)
points.(x|y): Find any of the alternatives specified

Find a single character, except newline or line terminator
points.\\b: Find a match at the beginning/end of a word, beginning like this: \bHI, end like this: HI\b
points.\\B: Find a match, but not at the beginning/end of a word
points.\\xxx: Find the character specified by an octal number xxx
points.\\xdd: Find the character specified by a hexadecimal number dd
points.\\udddd: Find the Unicode character specified by a hexadecimal number dddd
